title: Q2 - What happens if a company reports a breach late — is the penalty automatic?
description: No — the penalty for late reporting of a data breach under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) is not automatic. However, it is highly likely if the Data Protection Board of India determines that the delay was unreasonable, intentional, or negligent, or if it increased the risk of harm to individuals.
